Description:
Character & Charm All Rolled Into One...
Every so often a home comes onto the market with the perfect combination of position and proportion, and this just so happens to be that home. Rich in character with elegant features such as exposed brickwork and pitched ceilings that provide an instant feeling of space and comfort. 
Floating floors upon entry into a large lounge space, huge master bedroom exits to the left with walk in robe and updated ensuite. The second living room is separated by a large double sided chimney equipped with inbuilt gas heaters. Ducted gas heating and evaporative cooling are also installed throughout for complete year round convenience and comfort. 
Other highlights such as a built in bar and an abundance of built in cabinetry further enhance the livability of this property. A stunning renovated kitchen will impress with solid stone bench tops, stainless steel appliances including SMEG freestanding 900mm stove, range hood and dishwasher.
A further two bedrooms are privately positioned with a full bathroom dividing them, both boasting built in robes. A spacious laundry to the rear completes a practical interior. 
Externally, a concrete drive leads to a double lock up garage providing ample off street parking and secure storage. The property has multiple outdoor entertaining areas, both undercover and exposed to enjoy plenty of natural sunlight with both artificial and genuine turf creating great play spaces for children and pets on a plentiful 675m2 (approx).
Fantastically positioned to take advantage of the many local schools both primary and secondary, public transport including the Marshall & Waurn Ponds train stations, multiple major Shopping Plaza's, Deakin University & Epworth Hospital while also only being a short few minutes drive into the Geelong CBD and Waterfront.
PLEASE CONTACT ADAM NATONEWSKI TO ARRANGE A PRIVATE VIEWING.

Description:
Ticks all the boxes!
In the ever-popular suburb of Grovedale, you will fall in love with this beautiful home. Privately built with loads of natural light, this home offers self-sustained living. Formal lounge upon entry leading through to the kitchen area which is well equipped with gas cooktop, dishwasher, ample cupboard and bench space overlooking the light-filled living and dining area. The spacious living room is perfect for those family get together s opening out to the undercover alfresco area. With 3 good sized bedrooms, the master with ensuite and walk-in robe, while both the other bedrooms are serviced by the centrally located bathroom and separate toilet. Set on a good size block of 575sqm (approx), the backyard is a gardeners delight, with raised vegetable gardens, organic soil and water tanks with pump.
Extras Include:
- Reverse cycle heating and cooling
- 2 x Garden sheds
- Chicken shed
- BBQ with mains gas set up
- 8 Solar panels
Located close local schools, Waurn Ponds train station and a short drive to Waurn Ponds Shopping Centre, its sure to tick all the boxes!

Description:
Convenient & Appealing Lifestyle
Move straight into this tastefully renovated low maintenance unit tucked away in a private court only 50 metres to the Waurn Ponds Creek walking track and nature reserve. More great facilities nearby for your lifestyle requirements including Leisurelink Aquatic Recreation Centre, Waurn Ponds Shopping Precinct, Epworth Hospital, Deakin University, the Ring Rd & Surf Coast Hwy.
The property features sensible neutral tones throughout, separate light-filled lounge room with cathedral ceiling, R/C A/C & gas heating with sliding doors to the north-facing deck & courtyard for your entertainment needs & privacy.
The modern floating floor compliments the new kitchen with stone bench tops S/S oven, double sink & pantry which flows into the ample dining area.
2 Bedrooms with BIR, quality double blinds and W/W carpet with enough room for queen-sized beds.
Renovated wet areas include a bathroom with separate shower & bath, laundry with linen utility cupboard, separate toilet.
Single LU garage with new auto roller door & easy care garden completes this affordable property. There are only 2 units on the block, you will have your own title and shared driveway. Appealing to downsizers, investors & First Home Buyers, this property is sure to impress. Contact us now to book your private one on one inspection.

Address: 9 East View Terrace Jan Juc VIC 3228
Description:
It doesnt get much better than this!
Youll love:
The high-quality feel of this Jan Juc abode with an ocean view from the main living and master bedroom thats to die for!
The functionality of the homes split-level design; combining 4 generous bedrooms, 2 open plan living areas & a studio space thats ideal for operating a small business from.
Stunning features like Victorian Ash timber flooring, concrete kitchen bench tops, clever use of Messmate timber throughout, plus the Bluestone basins & walk-in shower in the master ensuite.
Loads of outdoor space to keep everyone happy with 2 fantastic entertaining decks overlooking the lush backyard & a veggie patch that gets plenty of sun.
Plus:
Youll never have a storage problem again thanks to all the clever indoor & outdoor solutions.
The blocks elevated position ensures that youll always have THAT ocean view!
Theres ample parking space for 2 cars & a trailer/boat on the top driveway, with access via an automatic gate.
Located an easy bike ride/stroll from the Jan Juc shops, main beach, parks & more few homes can match the completeness & quality appeal that this one has to offer.

Description:
Family Living In Sought After Location
Nestled amongst other quality homes in this highly sought after and convenient location you will find this stunning family home.
Upon entering this home, you will be surprised by the size, quality and what it has to offer
Overlooking the front garden, the spacious main bedroom creates a private oasis for parents. The walk-in robe is wonderfully spacious and the private en-suite. Three additional generous size bedrooms with built-in robes share close access to the central, main bathroom and separate toilet.
The stylish kitchen with a large island bench has an abundance of cupboard space, 900mm gas cooktop, electric wall oven, pantry and dishwasher. A spacious open plan kitchen, meals, and living area with convenient sliding door access to the outdoor undercover alfresco area. This indoor-outdoor flow is ideal for everyday living and entertaining. All of this is located on a low maintenance allotment of 619m2 (approx).
Add extras include a double remote lock-up garage with internal access, secure side access perfect for storage of a caravan or boat, gas ducted heating throughout and evaporative cooling keeping you comfortable in all seasons.
With the Bellarine Peninsula at your doorstep, a 15-minute drive to Geelong CBD and access to some of the regions best beaches, you are spoilt for choice. Only 5 minutes to Gateway Plaza shopping Centre, local schools, kindergartens and sporting facilities.
This wonderful home is ideal for any family wanting to enjoy everything this ever-popular suburb has to offer or the perfect investment with proven growth. If you're looking for the perfect family home without compromising on lifestyle, then don't go past this fabulous single-level home.

Description:
Private Inspections Available
Mid-Century Masterpiece On Approx. 5 Acres!
Architecturally designed by one of Melbournes Multi Award-Winning architects, this family home is set upon approx. 5 acres. Exuding retro charm and with rustic gardens surrounding the home, this private and tranquil lifestyle is yours to keep!
Public transport is a short walk from your front door, while the conveniences of Leopold are only a short drive away. With easy access to kindergartens, Leopold P.S. and the Gateway Plaza, the elements are in place for practical family living. Lake Connewarre is moments away for leisurely outdoor activities, while the Bellarine Peninsula invites you to spend your weekends exploring the finest wineries and stunning coastline.
Architecturally designed by the owner, this home is truly one-of-a-kind. The façade makes a striking statement with broken bricks, while the entrance showcases the floating staircase. Handmade coloured glass captures the suns rays, while the interiors ooze character with Cedar panelling and raked ceilings with laminated timber beams.
The sunken lounge is graced with an open fireplace, while the family room creates a peaceful setting for the whole family to enjoy. The dining/kitchen zone opens onto the tranquil alfresco, which will entice you to sit back and relish your picturesque surroundings. The kitchen boasts a walk-in pantry and stainless steel appliances (double-drawer dishwasher, wall oven, electric cooktop). Three BRs with built-in robes (one with direct alfresco access), bathroom, shower room, powder room, and laundry with storage complete the downstairs level.
Upstairs, the Master Bedroom opens onto the balcony that overlooks the surrounding trees and gardens. A walk-in robe provides ample storage, while the en suite features a shower, single vanity, and toilet. The 5th bedroom or study could also be used as a nursery. Zoned concrete slab heating and a split-system air conditioner keep you comfortable in all seasons. The double carport and single lock-up garage provide parking. Other features of this property include a fernery, town water, and a sealed front road.
A blissful lifestyle awaits with this unique family home! Inspect ASAP!
Insights: 31-39 Brinsmead Lane, Leopold VIC 3224 was last sold in 2020.

Description:
Plenty of Options in GROWTH ZONE
This home will suit families, investors, and developers alike! A real find in popular Marshall, offering a HUGE allotment of 1250 m2 (approx.) in a most convenient & central location. Developers / Investors this property is 200m from Marshall train station, has 2 crossovers with the potential to sub-divide (STCA)!
It could not get any easier for the Melbourne commuter as it's only a short walk to being all aboard to the big smoke.Families this property is perfectly positioned with a striking facade that will immediately capture your attention. If you have been dreaming of an idyllic lifestyle surrounded by local amenities, then you are going to adore calling this place home.
Comprising five spacious bedrooms all with build-ins. Offering an unsurpassed level of comfort, the floorplan showcases a warm family and formal dining room sweeping through to the kitchen, features include WIP and quality cabinetry, adjacent to a relaxed meals area. Three bedrooms (3rd being used as an office space) are serviced by the family bathroom.
As you step outside you are greeted with a well-established and expansive yard with plenty of scope for extensions or development! Alternately there is plenty of grassed areas to be used as a children's play area, or ideal for pets. Laundry and second bathroom completing downstairs. Upstairs discover the kids retreat and two spacious bedrooms featuring soaring ceilings all with built-ins.
Highlights include:
• New weatherboards to residence
• New carpet
• Plenty of storage
• Garage 6.5 m x 7.5 m fully powered
• Chook pen
• 2 x garden shed
• Veggie patches
• Return driveway
• Split system for heating and cooling
• Ceiling fan
• Polish timber flooring
Now is your chance to gain a slice of the Marshall market and capitalise while you can! Fantastic location close to IGA, ALDI and Marshall Station only a stone's throw away. The Waurn Ponds/Barwon River bike path is close by linking the city, Waurn Ponds, Deakin Uni & Epworth Hospital. Be sure to inspect to snap up this brilliant real estate opportunity!
*All information about the property has been provided to hayeswinckle by third parties. Hayeswinckle has not verified the information and does not warrant its accuracy or completeness. Parties should make and rely on their own enquiries in relation to this property

Description:
HIGH ON STYLE WITH PRIVACY LIFESTYLE AND LOCATION!!
Wonderfully located in the prestigious Ocean Acres Estate this brilliant home presents an exceptional and private lifestyle opportunity with its spacious single-level floorplan, meticulous attention to detail and its northern orientation to capture the north and bathe in natural sunlight. The generously proportioned interior reveals an open plan kitchen, dining and living area with a harmonious outlook to an undercover entertaining area and inviting, sun-drenched in-ground pool with Balinese themed gazebo, a dedicated theatre room with projector and screen, second living room with cosy gas log fire, reading / music room and study with built in cabinetry. The secluded master bedroom is decadently large and enjoys the east wing of the residence and boasts a luxurious en-suite and expansive walk in robe, while the remaining 3 bedrooms share a modern family bathroom on the west wing along with a separate powder room, laundry with great storage and linen press. The well-equipped kitchen is appointed with stone bench tops, Miele dishwasher, 900mm cooktop, separate servery to the outdoors and huge butlers' pantry. Packed with features including timber floorboards, surround sound, monitored security system, ducted central heating, evaporative cooling, ducted vacuum system, 2 x 20,000 litre water tanks, salt chlorinated in-ground swimming pool, cedar clad ceiling to the entertaining area, outdoor shower and a triple lock up garage with workshop area and internal and external access. The property boasts a studio with veranda and storeroom, sumptuously landscaped and secluded gardens on a 1-acre (4065m2) (approx.) parcel of land presenting a golden opportunity for the astute buyer to purchase their own slice of space, privacy, and lifestyle.
The Estate provides quick access to the Melbourne Ring Road via the Anglesea Highway and only minutes to the beach, Torquay town centre, primary and secondary schools as well as local amenities, do not delay your enquiry on this incredible property. Call us today!!

Description:
Prime River Precinct with Plenty of Potential!
This is an outstanding opportunity to purchase in the sought after river precinct in the emerging Belmont market, with a terrific block measuring approximately 690sqm and a home with plenty of potential.
Comprising flexible floorplan that accommodates three bedrooms and two separate and spacious living zones, functional kitchen with adjoining meals area, central bathroom and rear study area. Large backyard with single lock up garage, the house is set up well for family living. With plenty of scope to update and rejuvenate some of this homes unique features, there is certainly opportunity to add value to this property.
Situated close to Belmont Village Shopping Centre, High st amenities and local schools, and just as importantly walking distance to the river. The location brings a myriad of possibilities for home buyers, investors and developers who will see the unlimited potential this property presents to its prospective owner. Look to your future and seize this exceptional and rare opportunity!!

Description:
Character filled, tree top living.
IMPORTANT NOTICE REGARDING COVID-19:
Open for inspections will no longer be scheduled for the public. To organise your own private viewing, please contact Cam Foster on 0406 597 050.
Flawlessly located in a sought after, tree-lined locale, this updated architecturally designed property is awaiting its new owner. Boasting raked timber ceilings in the kitchen, living and dining area, plus in the master, natural character to this extent is truly rare to find. Complete with three bedrooms, two bathrooms, on a 631sqm (approx.) allotment, this unique split-level home offers all the comforts of a first home or investment. Just minutes from the Waurn Ponds Shopping mecca, Leisurelink, Epworth Hospital, and close proximity to quality schooling walking tracks, public transport, and the Ring Road for commuters or beach lovers.
The master bedroom includes an impeccably updated ensuite which showcases a double shower with waterfall shower head, stand-alone separate bath and oversized vanity. In addition, the master also includes its own walk-in robe, which is completely fitted out with cabinetry and sliding doors out onto the north-facing courtyard. The remaining two bedrooms are both serviced by the central bathroom and separate toilet, one includes its own built-in robes.
An open plan living area which flows onto the meal/dining area and kitchen, complete with renovated kitchen, with plenty of bench and cupboard space, integrated dishwasher and large sink. The dining and living area leads you through sliding glass doors to the undercover outdoor alfresco deck and back yard which is safe and secure for children and pets to play in. Additional features include ducted heating throughout, 3x split systems, 5kw solar panels, ample storage space, private courtyard gardens, double carport with remote door.
This property's natural charm and all it has to offer in the locale it situates is sure to grab the attention of many.
Insights: 23 Tettenhall Ridge, Belmont VIC 3216 was last sold in 2020 and 182 other 3 bedroom house in Belmont have recently been sold.

Description:
Only Steps Away From The Barwon River
The Feel:
Views of the Barwon River greet your arrival on quiet Minah Street, with boardwalks, jetties & boat ramps only metres away. Nestled amongst mature Moonah trees, this property occupies a large corner allotment; dual driveways & an XL DLUG with rear roller door accommodate extra vehicles. Upper & lower decks take advantage of the sunny north orientation, with seamless connection to the outdoors via both levels. 4 BRs include a luxe master (WIR & en suite), with options for a versatile home office/4th bedroom.
The Facts:
-Step onto the river boardwalks every day, with tranquil views of the estuary
-Meticulously maintained double-storey river house w/ 4BR, 2 living, 2 bathrooms
-Dining room with convenient powder room on upper level
-Sunny main living area flows onto north deck with glass balustrades
-Climate comfort with 5 x SSACs, wall heaters & ceiling fans
-Central kitchen with stone benchtops & quality Westinghouse appliances
-Private Master suite w/ SSAC; en-suite with twin vanities, concealed WC & large shower
-Ceiling fans & wall to wall robes in each BR, plus a large fitted WIR in the master
-Downstairs living/rumpus room with sliding doors to outdoor living & deck
-Family bathroom with large bath, shower, full span mirror & separate powder room
-Well-equipped laundry with rear door access to utilities area
-Backyard entertaining & sun lounge area designed to capture all day sun
-Oversized DLUG with workshop/shelving & rear roller door for open-air caravan/boat storage
-6kw solar system with an 8kw battery storage system, and solar hot water system
-Fully fenced backyard with native garden & large garden shed
-Lifestyle opportunity for permanent or weekender
-Idyllic, peaceful surrounds with abundant birdlife
-Other features of this cleverly zoned house include security system & ducted vaccum
-Direct access to river walking trails
The Owner Loves.
Being across the road from the river is incredibly special. The combination of peace, tranquility, the boardwalk and the abundant birdlife is extraordinary.
*All information offered by Bellarine Property is provided in good faith. Prospective purchasers are advised to make their own enquiries with respect to the information that is passed on. Bellarine Property will not be liable for any loss resulting from any action or decision by you in reliance on the information.

Description:
"EAGLES LANDING" - TRANQUILITY, PRIVACY, LIFESTYLE!!
Set against a spectacular Otway National Forest backdrop and positioned on 10.49 Acres (4.246Ha) picturesque acres in Bellbrae is this exceptional family home surrounded by mature gums, olive trees and wild life plus beautiful established gardens, guaranteeing the astute purchaser a relaxed, elegant rural lifestyle of the grandest proportions. Impeccably presented with a classic, contemporary feel and favored by its superb northern orientation, the residence comprises gracious and generous open plan living spaces capturing the beautiful rural outlook, gardens and pool area. This matchless property offers five bedrooms (a large private master bedroom with en-suite, WIR & parents retreat/reading room), guest bedroom with en-suite plus central bathroom and separate laundry. A stylish open plan kitchen with travertine bench tops, s/s appliances and walk-in pantry as well as butler pantry is perfect for any budding chef, complemented by sunken living/family room, a sophisticated formal dining room which opens on to a magnificent outdoor paved entertaining terrace and a hedged garden complete with a plunge pool and multiple alfresco areas. The additional living area/rumpus room at the rear of the home allows family members to enjoy their own space or they can venture into the separate sitting room at the front of the home and enjoy the open fireplace. Further features include: wood as well as gas heating, air conditioning and 2 Separate Residences one with a 2-bedroom self-contained cottage perfectly suited for guests or extended family to stay or potential B & B with kitchen, dining and living area plus two bathrooms and the other residence consists of 1 bedroom, kitchen and living area, a tack-room, well-maintained secure paddocks, storage sheds, games room/ gymnasium and chook pen. This truly is a great opportunity to purchase an exclusive and unique property that you can just move in, relax and enjoy the luxury retreat that you so richly deserve.
Insights: 35 Eagle Point Road, Bellbrae VIC 3228 was last sold in 2016 and 1 other 5 bedroom house in Bellbrae have recently been sold.

Description:
Family Entertainer in quiet court - walk to everything!
A desirable Court location is just the beginning for this immaculately presented home set on a 726m2 (approx) allotment. The home will impress with a clever blend of functionality and style. If you need plenty of room for the growing family but don't want to spend all weekend in the garden, this is the one you've been looking for!
The unassuming facade and low maintenance gardens welcome you in to the home, upon entry you instantly have a sense of space and natural light and can't help but be drawn into this inviting home. The front living/cinema room is an inviting space perfect for unwinding. The spacious master bedroom will impress with its size, walk-in robe and ensuite. A separate bedroom wing with two good sized bedrooms both with built-in robes and a central bathroom and separate toilet. A fourth bedroom or generous study is located off the hall.
The heart of the home is a generous open plan space incorporating lounge, dining area and large kitchen featuring electric wall oven, gas cook top with range-hood, dishwasher and plenty of storage with a fantastic butlers pantry.
A sliding door leads out to the resort style back yard which features include an undercover alfresco area perfect for BBQs and entertaining all year round and swimming pool complete with water slide. Along with a separate turfed area, which has a seperate access into the main living area from sliding glass doors.
The home is spacious throughout and with features including open plan design, dual living areas, 2 bathrooms with a third toilet, gas ducted heating, reverse cycle AC,a gas log heater in the living room, bedroom ceiling fans, carpet & tiled flooring throughout this impressive home is perfect for the growing family.
There is a functional laundry with external access, an abundance of storage and access through to the outdoor storage room. A remote double garage with internal access completes the home.
A stones throw from Waurn Ponds Shopping Centre, local schools and sporting fields and only a 5 minute drive to Deakin University, Epworth Hospital and Geelong ring road this home perfectly combines convenience and lifestyle. Inspect today!
*All information about the property has been provided to Hayeswinckle by third parties. Hayeswinckle has not verified the information and does not warrant its accuracy or completeness. Parties should make and rely on their own enquiries in relation to this property.

Description:
Blonde brick classic.
IMPORTANT NOTICE REGARDING COVID-19:
Open for inspections will no longer be scheduled for the public. To organise your own private viewing, please contact Deane Hughes on 0407 926 659 or Kingston Wade on 0438 033 999.
On offer here, in a peaceful and convenient pocket of Belmont is this charming 2-bedroom classic, with endless potential.
The meticulously maintained home is situated on a generous 630m2 block and is comprised of 2 spacious bedrooms with built-in robes, a light-filled living area, and a central bathroom with separate toilet. The kitchen overlooks the backyard and offers gas cooking and ample cupboard space.
Heating and cooling are taken care of with a gas central heating, gas heater in the living room and an air conditioner in the kitchen/dining room as well as a new aircon in the main bedroom.
Outside the home, you will find an established front yard with a low-maintenance back yard complete with an oversized single brick garage.
With capital improvements in Belmont undoubtedly money well spent, this home could be ideal for those searching for that next renovation project or for those looking to move in and make it their own. With the additional possibility to extend (STCA) this property could be the perfect opportunity to step into the Belmont property market and create something special!
Situated close to the Surf Coast Highway, only minutes from the Geelong CBD, pain-free access to public transport and within highly sought-after school catchment zones, just 5 minutes from the Waurn Ponds Shopping Centre, the location of this property truly provides convenient connection to all that Geelong has to offer. This home really does present exceptional value for money in the ever-popular Belmont market. Don't miss this opportunity, enquire today!

Description:
Smart, neat and great location!
This neat first floor 1 bedroom apartment is ideally located and would suite a single or couple looking to enter the property market at an affordable level. Equally for the investor it offers a great return at an estimated $250-$270 /week. A north facing aspect offers a lovely light filled open plan kitchen, dining and lounge and features timber floors. The kitchen features a new electric Induction cooktop and oven with rangehood. A split system air conditioner provides heating and cooling for all year round comfort. A good sized freshly carpeted bedroom with built in robes leads to the bathroom with shower, vanity and fittings for a washing machine. An onsite carport rounds off a very attractive package. Located within easy walking distance to the Highton Shopping Village and the Barwon River it enjoys all the amenities that make Highton such a desirable place to live. You'll need to be quick to inspect as this one won't last!

Description:
A SUPERB LOCATION & ONE FOR THE ENTERTAINER!!
Seldom does a home of this calibre and quality become available in the highly coveted 'Old Torquay' This superb home is not only private, immaculate, and low maintenance but an entertainer's dream with ocean views. Extremely spacious for grand scale entertaining, this impeccable, 3 bedroom plus study/4th bedroom, 3-bathroom, residence adapts to all your living needs. Featuring 2 living zones, including wood heating and a gas log fire, the light filled and well-appointed kitchen with stone bench tops is at the centre of the home and sits adjacent to the glassed dining room which draws in the outdoors giving an overall feeling of space. The lounge area has fully opening sliding doors offering unrestricted access to an outstanding north-facing, sundrenched, hardwood decked alfresco area with 6-person spa bath. The partially undercover decking overlooks the spa, manicured and landscaped grounds, and makes indoor/outdoor entertaining a breeze. There are built in robes to the 3 bedrooms and the master incorporates a resort style en-suite! A sky light streams plenty of natural light through the central pass through family bathroom while the third bathroom and toilet is situated for ease of access from the spa, beach, or outdoor entertaining zone. Set on a 648m2 (approx.) allotment this unique residence makes a feature of the natural light, high ceiling with windows to the north, polished timber floorboards, split system heating/cooling, ceiling fans, 5kw solar panel system as well as terrific under house storage space & workshop and onsite parking. The property is fully fenced and secured by an electric roller door with access gate. You have now found the perfect coastal lifestyle or holiday home with an unbeatable private location and only a stones' throw to Torquay's prestigious Esplanade, Front Beach, and family friendly Cosy Corner. 36 Beales Street cannot, and should not, be missed. Call us today to arrange your inspection.
Insights: 36 Beales Street, Torquay VIC 3228 was last sold in 2020 and 126 other 3 bedroom house in Torquay have recently been sold.

Description:
LIVE BY THE SEA!
This affordable two bedroom brick unit is perfectly positioned in Rudd Ave, a short walk to front and surf beach, the Bell St precinct with its regarded restaurant's, cafes and hotel, as well as all other amenities that this thriving coastal town has to offer - it just doesn't get much better located than this.
Comprising two bedrooms with BIRs, well appointed kitchen/ dining/ living area with ample space, updated main bathroom with bath and a separate shower recess and vanity, separate toilet, serviceable laundry with access to small fully fenced enclosed courtyard at the rear.
Other features include: Fully tiled living spaces, reverse cycle heating/cooling, electric hot water, carport with access to rear yard, low maintenance outdoor areas, low body corporate fees
A great opportunity for the investor, holiday maker or first home buyer being only a ten minute drive to Geelong and less than an hour to Melbourne, making Torquay the most accessible Surf coast destination from the city.
Don't delay your inspection
Insights: 2/7 Rudd Avenue, Torquay VIC 3228 was last sold in 2020 and 13 other 2 bedroom unit in Torquay have recently been sold.

Description:
608sqm Vacant Land Perfect Orientation
Perfectly located in the popular Zeally Sands Estate Torquay. This large parcel of land is ready to build on.
Homes built on the north boundary are single level at the fence line, allowing winter sun onto your land, perfect for thermal benefits in winter and cost savings with heating. Easy walk to schools, parkland, beaches, and shopping. The generous size of this land gives you multiple options to build your dream seaside escape.
Land
- All services supplied to land boundary including recycled water
- Capped and lapped fencing along all adjoining house boundaries
- Driveway crossover located on right hand side
- Land dimensions - 16m wide, 38m long
- Small easement along the rear east facing boundary
- Land size approx. 608sqm
Location
- 20-minute walk to Whites Beach
- Stroll to the Zeally Sands playground which includes a BBQ and picnic table
- Walk to Peppers and enjoy the golf course resort facilities including Hanners Restaurant and Bar
- Play 18 holes of Golf at the world-famous Sands Golf Course
- Childs Play pre-school is just around the corner
- Torquay Coast primary school, Lisieux Catholic primary school and Surf Coast Secondary College are close by
- Walk to The Dunes shopping centre for groceries, café's, restaurants, excellent pizza, a gym, medical centre, and bakery
- Public transport close by
Insights: 44 Swallowtail Drive, Torquay VIC 3228 was last sold in 2020.

Description:
A Hidden Coastal Gem Abbuting Deep Creek Reserve
A hidden gem located in one of Torquays most sought after locations enjoys the natural beauty of Deep Creek Reserve accessed directly from your back gate. Designed by award winning architect David Seely, the cottage style property possesses charm and is full of natural light.
What YOU'LL LOVE:
- Elevated pitched ceilings with highlight windows for maximum natural light
- Floating timber floorboards to the main living area
- Gas log fire plus s/s heating and cooling
- Feature French doors
- Upstairs master bedroom/retreat with WIR and sitting/study area and private balcony
- Brand new Stainless Steel Bosch dishwasher
- Stainless steel Westinghouse oven and ceramic electric cook top
- Under stair storage
- Plantation shutters
- Under floor heating in bathroom
- Japanese toilet with heated seat
- Beautifully landscaped with extensive feature 'crazy paving'
- Solar panels
- Undercover alfresco with brand new decking
- 350m walk to the beach and an easy level stroll to town centre
What The VENDOR LOVES:
I love this place because it is such a friendly neighbourhood. The unique design of the house maximises the natural light. The balcony is the perfect spot to sip an evening drink and watch friendly people and dogs passing by to the beach. I can walk along Deep Creek and the proximity to the beach for further walks and a pleasant stroll into Gilbert Street or a suburban stroll to the Dunes Village. Deep Creek Reserve right outside and no lawns to mow.
Internal area
157.93m²
Insights: 41 Orungal Court, Torquay VIC 3228 was last sold in 2020 and 10 other 2 bedroom house in Torquay have recently been sold.
